subject: Problem while using StrutsTestCase...can anyone please help me
msgSnippet: Hi all, I am new to JUnit. I am currently testing Struts action classes using JUnit. I gave a simple code... public void testSuccessDeletion() {
messageBody:
Hi all,

I am new to JUnit. I am currently testing Struts action classes using JUnit. I gave a simple code...

public void testSuccessDeletion() {

setRequestPathInfo("/employeeInfo");
addRequestParameter("empID","10");
actionPerform();
verifyForward("deleteRecords");
assertEquals("Records Deleted Successfully",getSession().getAttribute("SUCCESS"));
verifyNoActionErrors();

}

Am getting an error when the method actionPerform() is being called. I am getting the following error.

Feb 28, 2006 10:02:30 PM org.apache.struts.util.PropertyMessageResources
INFO: Initializing, config='org.apache.struts.util.LocalStrings', returnNull=true
Feb 28, 2006 10:02:30 PM org.apache.struts.util.PropertyMessageResources
INFO: Initializing, config='org.apache.struts.action.ActionResources', returnNull=true
Feb 28, 2006 10:02:31 PM org.apache.struts.action.ActionServlet
SEVERE: null
Feb 28, 2006 10:02:31 PM org.apache.struts.action.ActionServlet
SEVERE: MSG_EXCEPTION_LOGGED
Feb 28, 2006 10:02:31 PM servletunit.struts.MockStrutsTestCase
SEVERE: Error initializing action servlet
Feb 28, 2006 10:02:31 PM servletunit.struts.MockStrutsTestCase
SEVERE: MSG_EXCEPTION_LOGGED


Please help me.
Swetha
